data.name: Bump Savings
data.description: An account designed to help children kick start their savings. Available for under 18s.

features.additionalInfo: Withdraw funds via free online transfers to your Westpac everyday account, or by visiting a branch (fees apply on an everyday account)
Set up and track your personalised savings goals via Online Banking
Statements : 6 monthly, or more frequently on request.
No limit on the number of accounts that customer can hold
Savings Goals feature is available for this account
No minimum opening balance for this account

eligibility.additionalInfo: Anyone aged 12-17 can open a Bump account for themselves. Parents can open a Bump Savings account for their child who is under 18.
Anyone aged 12-17 can open a Bump account for themselves

eligibility.additionalValue: You need to have an Australian residential address and currently be in Australia.

fees.name: Online Banking (including Mobile Banking)
fees.additionalInfo: Online transfer withdrawals via Online Banking.

fees.name: Telephone Banking withdrawal (self service)
fees.additionalInfo: Telephone Banking is not available for a parent signatory, and self service Telephone Banking is not available for children under 12.

fees.name: Telephone Banking withdrawal (staff assisted)
fees.additionalInfo: Telephone Banking is not available for a parent signatory, and self service Telephone Banking is not available for children under 12.

depositRates.additionalValue: Bonus interest is payable each month that you: Make a deposit to the account; ensure your account balance is higher at the end than the beginning; and keep your account balance above $0 at all times.
